headline: Judge allows Finchem, Gosar, Biggs to stay on ballot
author: Howard Fischer
sentences: In a 19-page ruling released Friday, Maricopa County Superior Court Judge Christopher Coury said private individuals have no legal right to enforce a provision of the U.S. Constitution that bars those ...
A judge will not bar three officials who allegedly were involved in some way in the Jan. 6, 2021 riot from running again for office.
